attributes.action: Stop all weather apps and news!!!
attributes.additional_details: For years now we've been told we're having thsi great snow, as it arrived no it hasn't. All these kiddies that have never seem snow and the met Office and many other weather apps are feeding us with lies.
attributes.background:
Stop all weather apps or news!! Getting everyone's hopes up for snow and it rains!!

So if we didn't have anything weather apps or news no false information could be spread about and certainly people won't have their hopes up.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or House of Commons are directly responsible for.

Decisions about how to forecast the weather is a matter for individual news outlets and app designers, not the Government or House of Commons.
